name: Helmer, Helmsman of the Skyfang Brigade
desc: During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Skyfang Brigade" monster from your hand, except "Helmer, Helmsman of the Skyfang Brigade". If another "Skyfang Brigade" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field while this monster is on the field: You can discard 1 "Skyfang Brigade" card; draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Helmer, Helmsman of the Skyfang Brigade" once per turn.
